DOC.detailed_description: Non-diabetic patient MS recruit outpatient clinic Division Nephrology Federal University Juiz de Fora , Brazil . MS define accord criterion National Cholesterol Education Program Adult Treatment Panel III ( NCEP-ATPIII ) . The study divide two phase : phase 1 ( baseline ) phase 2 ( intervention ) . At first study visit , full medical history take clinical examination perform . Blood sample take determine plasma glucose level , fast 2 h 75-g oral glucose overload ( oral glucose tolerance test ; OGTT ) , well level plasma insulin , creatinine , total cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , triglyceride , uric acid . At visit 2 , preliminary result evaluate urine sample collect duplicate measurement microalbuminuria . Creatinine clearance estimate use Cockcroft-Gault formula , correct body surface area . The subject keep free medication ( statin , antihypertensive , anti-inflammatory drug ) entire study period . The medication allow study analgesic dipyrone hioscin . At visit 3 , patient evaluate registered dietitian expertise medical nutrition therapy aim achieve weight loss least 5 % baseline . Patients commence 12-week calorie-restricted diet consist 50 % carbohydrate , 20-25 % protein , 25-30 % fat . The patient evaluate dietitian every 2 week . At final visit laboratory test repeat . At end phase 2 , patient divide two group : responder , achieve least 5 % reduction body weight non-responders , achieve target weight reduction .
